Reentrancy in Staker.deposit(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#440-451):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(RagnaAddress).safeTransferFrom(staker,address(this),_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#445)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stakerInternalTime[staker] = now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#448)
	- stakerRewards[staker] = stakerRewards[staker].add(viewRecentStakerRewardTokenAmount(staker)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#447)
	- stakerTokenBalance[staker] = stakerTokenBalance[staker].add(_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#450)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Staker.stake() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#311-354):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(RagnaAddress).mint(address(this),x) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#324)
	- IERC20(RagnaAddress).approve(UNIROUTER,x) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#329)
	- Uniswap(UNIROUTER).swapExactTokensForETH(x,1,path,_LiquidityProvider,INF) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#330)
	- sendValue(_LiquidityProvider,address(this).balance / 2) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#333)
		- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#260)
	- IERC20(RagnaAddress).mint(address(this),toMint) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#339)
	- IERC20(RagnaAddress).approve(UNIROUTER,amountTokenDesired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#344)
	- Uniswap(UNIROUTER).addLiquidityETH{value: address(this).balance}(RagnaAddress,amountTokenDesired,1,1,address(this),INF) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#345)
	External calls sending eth:
	- sendValue(_LiquidityProvider,address(this).balance / 2) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#333)
		- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#260)
	- Uniswap(UNIROUTER).addLiquidityETH{value: address(this).balance}(RagnaAddress,amountTokenDesired,1,1,address(this),INF) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#345)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- LPTokenBalance[staker] = LPTokenBalance[staker].add(poolTokenGot) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#353)
	- internalTime[staker] = now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#351)
	- rewards[staker] = rewards[staker].add(viewRecentRewardTokenAmount(staker)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Staker__1.sol#350)
